---
title: "Difference between the Lexical Features of the text between the original version and the LLM-generated version"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}

main_data = read.csv("all_lexical_stats.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

for (metric in c("# sentences", "Avg. Word Length")){
  metric_data = main_data[main_data$metric == metric,]
  metric_data = metric_data[metric_data$llm != "gemini",]
  print("#################")
  print(metric)
  print(t.test(metric_data$original_value, metric_data$rewritten_value, paired = TRUE))
  print(cohen.d(metric_data$original_value, metric_data$rewritten_value, paired = TRUE))
  print("#################")

}  

```
